About 1A Primus Ave Unit 1A

Charming one bedroom home located off a privately gated footpath in Beacon Hill. Newer kitchen with oak flooring, recessed lighting, and solid wood cabinets. The marble bathroom has a full sized tub. The spacious bedroom includes an oversized closet. The beautifully landscaped common patio and grill area makes for a perfect place to relax or entertain guests. Moments away from MGH, MBTA red line, restaurants and shopping.
